name: tweaks
description: common style/layout changes and custom CSS insertion.

options.label: height of frameless dragarea:
options.tooltip: the rectangle added at the top of a window in 'integrated titlebar' mode, used to drag/move the window.

options.label: responsive columns breakpoint (px)
options.tooltip: the width in pixels below which in-page columns are resized to appear full-width so content isn't squished.

options.label: snappy transitions
options.tooltip: set animation time for all css-driven animations to 0s. may not affect element motion e.g. the sidebar popping out.

options.label: readable line spacing
options.tooltip: greater line spacing between text blocks.

options.label: condense bullet points
options.tooltip: tighter line spacing between bullet point blocks.

options.label: bracketed links
options.tooltip: render links surrounded with [[brackets]] instead of __underlined__.
